name: Lysodren
indications: lysodren indicated treatment patients inoperable , functional nonfunctional , adrenocortical carcinoma ( acc ) .
contraindications: recommended initial dose lysodren 2000 mg 6000 mg orally , three four divided doses per day food . ( 2.3 ) titrate lysodren dose achieve plasma level 14 20 mg/l . ( 2.3 ) lysodren lipophilic accumulates adipose tissue . ( 2.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions: lysodren tablets supplied 500 mg white , round , biconvex , scored tablets , bisected one side impressed `` bl `` `` l1 `` side . 100 tablets per bottle : ndc 76336-080-60
indications_original: LYSODREN is indicated for the treatment of patients with inoperable, functional or nonfunctional, adrenocortical carcinoma (ACC).
contraindications_original: The recommended initial dose of LYSODREN is 2000 mg to 6000 mg orally, in three or four divided doses per day with food. ( 2.3 ) Titrate LYSODREN dose to achieve a plasma level of 14 to 20 mg/L. ( 2.3 ) LYSODREN is lipophilic and accumulates in adipose tissue. ( 2.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
LYSODREN tablets are supplied as 500 mg white, round, biconvex, scored tablets, bisected on one side and impressed with "BL" over "L1" on the other side.
                  
                     100 tablets per bottle: NDC 76336-080-60
